title: Contact | Integrative Medical Institute of Orange County
description: You can find Integrative Medical Institute of Orange County at 1440 East Chapman Avenue Orange, CA 92886 or contact us at 714-771-2880.
sitename: Integrative Medical Institute of Orange County
cleaned_text: Contact Us At the Integrative Medical Institute we work with patients to achieve optimal wellness, health, and happiness. Integrative Medical Institute of Orange County 1440 East Chapman Fri: 9 AM-1 PM Sat & Sun: Closed Appointments Our office visits are by appointment only. If you'd like to schedule an appointment please click the button below, fill the appointment form and we will contact you as soon as possible. Where we are located Integrative Medical Institute Of Orange County 1440 East Chapman
